output:
This, this is the way
How we move through the rain
How we go through the rain
Until the day we're born again
This, this is the place
Where we open up our minds
Where we turn and raise our eyes
Into the space of limitless pain
This is everything
This, this is the time
Where we find we've got enough
Where every heart opens up
Into the night, universal love
This, this is home
Where you and I both find love
Where we are forever one
In the sea of tragedy
This is everything
This, this is the end
Where nothing else can be said
Where words can no longer tread
Onward we go beyond the night
In the night
In the night
In the night
In the night
In the night
In the night
In the night
